examples.example: 我们一起努力必然能创造更美好的未来。

translate.english: We work together and will surely be able to create a more beautiful future.

examples.example: 我们在前进的道路上相互扶持，共同进步。

translate.english: We support each other on the road of progress and make common progress.

examples.example: 我们一起怀揣着梦想，坚定地朝着目标前进。

translate.english: We carry the dream together and move forward firmly towards the goal.
